Description:
LUXURY AND LIFESTYLE
CLYDE NORTH: (BERWICK WATERS) If you are in search of a prestigious home offering modern, luxury living to enjoy within a secure location, then look no further. This two-storey home (approximately 46 squares under the roof line) offers a functional, family orientated floor plan with a long list of top end extras.
On entry, you are greeted with beautiful porcelain floor tiles, raised 2.74m ceilings, a large formal lounge room, study and powder room and internal access from the garage.
The kitchen features waterfall bench tops, generous frosted glass 920mm overhead cupboards the full length of the kitchen benchtop. Other features include Blum soft draw closes on all draws. There is a large walk-in pantry, quality stainless steel appliances that include a 900mm cook top & oven, range-hood and dishwasher. All this and a whole lot more overlook the family and dining zones. Adjacent to the kitchen and dining zone is the alfresco area which is outdoor living at its finest with a built in BBQ and bar fridge.
The upstairs master suite is complete with the en suite offering spa bath, double vanities, shower with wall niche and toilet. On opposite sides of the master suite you will find his and hers walk in robes. The balcony is privately accessible for the parents to relax and unwind. Also located upstairs are the three remaining bedrooms. Two are serviced by the family bathroom and separate toilet whilst the 4th bedroom has its own en suite, perfect for guests or extended family.
If you have been considering taking a step up into luxury, then take advantage of this outstanding opportunity which is move in ready so you can start enjoying a new level in living within this convenient and desired location. Make sure to come and see for yourself, you won't be disappointed.
Added internal and external features include;
* Porter Davis Prestige Home with all inclusions

* Water tap for fridge

* Opticom connection, no external aerials required for TV, Foxtel or internet
* Hidden electrical and data connection wires family room, 4 internet connection in family room, Movie Room, Study and Kids retreat.
* Floor to roof tiling in main en suite
* Spa bath to main en suite, dual basins to main en suite and main bathroom
* En suite to master bedroom and one other bedroom
* Porcher Cygnet Twin shower with square overhead rose and Posh Bristol hand held showers and wall niches to all bathrooms
* 900mm overhead and floor cupboards in laundry, linen and broom cupboards to laundry, glass door entry from laundry to yard
* Solid Merbau front door with Lockwood door handles and locks
